about:
Let'sPVP

 Refresh(Yourself)
Hi,My name , obviously,Is Dardounet,I Love Playing Minecraft , especially pvp server like ocn,avicus,and others.
I think i'm a pretty good pvper,maybe not the best,but whatever.
I'm not really good at writing big things,I often lost my ideas , or just bad organised.
So I Will Stop here to don't write shit....
Ok,Time to write some random things:
Love Minecraft,I'm really proud to be one of the Nemesis' member (on Ocn).
My Pvp skill aren't the best,but I do all I can to improve.
I Never rage (because I think it's totally useless oO)
My Best Friend is SharkfucR,we're friend forever ;3,I'll never thanks him enough to show me all these good pvp server.(And for a lot of other things =D)
I Love moderating,i've been mod on a lots of small servers,my next aim is avicus maybe,or ocn :3
Ok Finish for now,will continue later :3

Ok,Bye , Have Fun , And see You I.G. guy
Don't Be scared to add me in friend , I won't beat you ;)

Also,my principal aim is to be mod :3 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f2JuxM-snGc)
